statements: UPDATE IoT_Data SET data_value = 10.25 WHERE device_id = 1;
UPDATE IoT_Data SET device_name = 'Sensor_1', timestamp = '2022-01-15 10:30:00' WHERE device_id = 2;
UPDATE IoT_Data SET data_value = 10.5, device_name = 'Sensor-A' WHERE device_id = 1;
UPDATE IoT_Data SET timestamp = '2022-01-01 12:00:00', data_type = 'Temperature', device_id = 2 WHERE device_name = 'Sensor-B';
UPDATE IoT_Device_Data SET device_name = 'Temperature Sensor' WHERE device_id = 'b64d5b90-6bf4-4a56-857e-16d799abdc62';
UPDATE Blockchain_Data SET block_data = '{"block_number": 100, "transactions": ["tx1", "tx2"]}' WHERE block_id = '9bd89fa3-2d5f-4b7d-b6c1-40a1a3fbe3f6';
UPDATE IoT_Device_Data SET device_name='Temperature Sensor' WHERE device_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
UPDATE Blockchain_Data SET block_data = '{"hash": "abcdef123456", "transactions": [{"from": "Alice", "to": "Bob", "amount": 100}]}' WHERE block_id='abcdef12-3456-7890-abcdef-1234567890ab';
UPDATE IoT_Device SET device_name = 'Smart Hub', device_type = 'Gateway' WHERE device_id = 1;
UPDATE Device_Analytics SET analytics_result = 'Success', analysis_date = '2022-01-15' WHERE analytics_id = 3;
UPDATE IoT_Device SET device_name = 'Thermostat', creation_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE device_id = 1;
UPDATE Device_Analytics SET analytics_result = 'Warning: High Temperature', analysis_date = '2022-09-30' WHERE analytics_id = 3;
UPDATE IoT_devices SET device_name = 'Updated Device 1' WHERE device_id = 1;
UPDATE IoT_devices SET blockchain_address = 'updated_blockchain_address' WHERE device_name = 'Device 2';
UPDATE IoT_devices SET device_name = 'Updated Device Name' WHERE device_id = 1
UPDATE Device_alerts SET alert_message = 'New Alert Message', alert_timestamp = NOW() WHERE alert_id = 3
UPDATE device_data SET device_name = 'New Device Name' WHERE device_id = 1;
UPDATE blockchain_data SET timestamp = '2022-01-01 12:00:00' WHERE block_id = 5;
UPDATE device_data SET device_name = 'Updated Device 1' WHERE device_id = 1;
UPDATE device_status SET timestamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, status = 'Online' WHERE device_id = (SELECT device_id FROM device_data WHERE device_name = 'Device 2');
